features.title: Everything you need to budget effectively
features.description: Unlike typical expense trackers, Spendiee helps you plan ahead so you're always in control of your finances.

pre_plan_budget.title: Pre-Plan Your Budget
pre_plan_budget.description: Plan expenses before the month begins. Know exactly where your money will go before you spend it.

categories_expenses.title: Categories & Expenses
categories_expenses.description: Organize your expenses into custom categories. Group similar costs together for better insights.

budget_templates.title: Budget Templates
budget_templates.description: Create reusable templates for recurring budgets. Save time with one-click budget recreation.

transaction_tracking.title: Transaction Tracking
transaction_tracking.description: Log transactions against your planned expenses. See real spending vs. budgeted amounts instantly.

income_management.title: Income Management

visual_insights.title: Visual Insights
visual_insights.description: Beautiful charts show spending patterns. Make smarter decisions with data-driven insights.

how_it_works.title: How Spendiee works
how_it_works.description: Get started in minutes. Our simple workflow makes budgeting feel effortless.

step_1.title: Set Up Your Income
step_1.description: Add your income sources and categorize them. Track salary, freelance work, investments, and more.

step_2.description: Plan your monthly expenses before spending. Assign amounts to each expense category you create.

step_3.title: Track Transactions
step_3.description: Log your actual spending against planned amounts. See how you're doing in real-time.

step_4.title: Review & Optimize
step_4.description: Analyze your spending patterns over time. Adjust future budgets based on real data.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.meta_description: Spendiee Privacy Policy - Learn how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.
privacy.section_1_content: Spendiee ("we," "our," or "us") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our budgeting application. Please read this privacy policy carefully. If you do not agree with the terms of this privacy policy, please do not access the application.
privacy.section_2_content: We collect information that you provide directly to us and information that is automatically collected when you use our service:
privacy.section_2_item_1: Account Information: Email address, password, and any other information you provide during registration
privacy.section_2_item_2: Financial Data: Budgets, expenses, income sources, transactions, categories, and any other financial information you enter into the application
privacy.section_2_item_3: Usage Data: Information about how you interact with the application, including features used and time spent
privacy.section_2_item_4: Device Information: Browser type, device type, operating system, and IP address
privacy.section_2_item_5: Cookies and Tracking: We use cookies to store your language preferences and maintain your session
privacy.section_3_content: We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our services, including: processing your transactions, managing your budgets, generating analytics and reports, authenticating your account, sending you service-related communications, and personalizing your experience. We do not sell, rent, or share your personal information with third parties for their marketing purposes.
privacy.section_4_content: Your data is stored securely using Supabase, a trusted cloud database service. We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the Internet or electronic storage is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.
privacy.section_5_content: We retain your personal information for as long as your account is active or as needed to provide you services. If you delete your account, we will delete or anonymize your personal information, except where we are required to retain it for legal or regulatory purposes.
privacy.section_6_content: You have the right to access, update, correct, or delete your personal information at any time through your account settings. You may also request a copy of your data or request deletion of your account. If you have any questions or concerns about your privacy rights, please contact us.
privacy.section_7_content: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to maintain your session, remember your language preferences, and improve your experience. You can control cookies through your browser settings, but disabling cookies may affect the functionality of the application.
privacy.section_8_content: We use Supabase for authentication and data storage. Supabase processes your data in accordance with their privacy policy and security standards. We do not share your information with any other third-party services for marketing or advertising purposes.
privacy.section_9_content: Our service is not intended for children under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. If you are a parent or guardian and believe your child has provided us with personal information, please contact us immediately.
privacy.section_10_content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "Last updated" date. You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes.
